smarthonHome.Button: When the Pin is pressed, it will trigger the function inside the block
smarthonHome.Turn180Servo: Control the 180 degree servo to specific angle
smarthonHome.Turn360Servo: Control the 360 degree servo to rotate with direction and Speed
smarthonHome.TurnBuzzer: Turn on mono tone Buzzer to make the noise
smarthonHome.TurnMotor: Control the Motor to spin with specific speed
smarthonHome.getFlame: Read the detection result of flame sensor, return true when detect flame, otherwise return false
smarthonHome.getIAQ: Basic on the temperature and humidity to calculate the IAQ score, detail can refer to online documentation
smarthonHome.getLight: Read the light intensity (in percentage) result form light sensor
smarthonHome.readDHT11: Query the temperature and humidity infromation from DHT11 Temperature and Humidity sensor
smarthonHome.readHumidityData: Get the humidity value (in percentage) after queried the Temperature and Humidity sensor
smarthonHome.readTemperatureData: Get the Temperature value (degree in Celsius or Fahrenheit) after queried the Temperature and Humidity sensor
smarthonHome.read_distance_sensor_home: Read the distance data from the ultrasonic distance sensor, can return data in different unit.
smarthonHome.read_motion_sensor_home: Read the detection result of motion sensor, return true when something moving, otherwise return false
